scripts.build: cd packages/domain && yarn build && cd ../repository/ && yarn build && cd ../web-service/ && yarn build
scripts.create:db: cd packages/repository && npx prisma db push

scripts.start:web:dev: yarn install && yarn build && yarn create:db && cd packages/web-service && yarn start:dev
